text: "Changes" (written as "changes") is the second single off of American rapper XXXTentacion's second studio album ?. The song was released on March 2, 2018. The song was able to make it to #18 on the Billboard Hot 100. It was also certified 5Ã— Platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). The song has over 1 billion streams on Spotify. Rapper PnB Rock helped write the song. He is also featured on the song but is uncredited. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2018 songs Category:2010s ballads Category:XXXTentacion songs Category:Hip hop songs Category:Rhythm and blues ballads
title: Changes (XXXTentacion song)
